name: Doors (itch) (McFarlane Design)
description:
Doors is a psychological platformer which follows a twelve-year-old boy after a tragic accident. The Boy has since developed retrograde amnesia. Search deep inside The Boy’s subconscious to discover what has happened to The Boy.

Doors focuses around domestic family violence and introduces these ideas through cartoon imagery, for example The Boy’s recollection of a violent incident is currently a BBQ with a red colour. In the Public Beta version of Doors you will have access to 21 levels (40% of the game) including two boss fights. Play with keyboard or controller on your own Windows PC. The Doors Beta will release later this month, just in time for Christmas!
